tags: None
review: *** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ** **** *********** She owns the cases and understands when to prioritise. She will never leave you in the middle of dismay and will handhold until you have your concern addressed satisfactorily. Take the case of my baby, where he had to go through an operation on abdominal intussusception when he was just a year old. Dr. Meena detected the case and in no time knew that CloudNine will not have adequate infrastructure to operate the case. She ensured to call her professor in Manipal, Dr. Radhakrishnan immediately and arranged for safe passage transfer for my baby to Dr. Radhakrishnan's capable hand. It does not stop here. Even though she was not linked directly to the case, she continuously followed up with us, the parents, on a regular basis to ensure , my baby is getting proper care and support. A very approachable person indeed. She will respond to your queries anytime in email and always maintain communication. Your baby will never get treated like another case in a hospital , when Dr. Meena is attending your child. She is an active listener, and quite often we see doctors don't provide time to listen to the parents concerns , probably because another patient is waiting in queue. However, Dr. Meena balances her time well and this is definitely a deciding factor as to why she is a favorite among thousands of parents and their children. * **** *** ***** *** *** **** ** **** *** **** *** *******Take care. Indranyl & Paromita ( Ron's parent - UHID 205854 Cloud Nine )

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I delivered twin in cloud nine and regular predi is Dr. Aravind, however its highly not possible to get an appointment with him. Luckily got to know Dr.Meena by one of the working staff there.
My first vist Dr.Meena: she welcome you with a warm smile that's gives a confidence and she will listen to your problem and give a solution and explain why she prescribe the medicine to your loved one. Through mail she will explain about  report results... Iam highly satisfied to take my little one to Dr.meena. 
Would recommend her to all my Fren's and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Meena.. is our family pediatrician, she is not only caring for kids,her treatments are highly logical and worth visiting her for quality treatment.
She educate us on the issues .. especially her friendly nature earns a believability.
She also helps us through email response especially when were are out of the city or in office.
I'm a working professional, living very far. Hard to travel to hospital for each single issue for my 2 children often.
Hence her email support helps us a lot..
Kudos for her all time support..
We love her .. 
Especially our kids.
Doctor .. pls keep up the great work.
God bless you to touch more lives..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I consulted doctor Meena very recently for my 5year old son who had high fever for more than 5 days. Very first interaction has been very comforting for us where she approached to the underlying issue in a methodical manner and did not prescribe unnecessary medication.
I would recommend dr meena any day.

tags: None
review:
Dr Meena is very good doctor. I have only had positive experience with her when ever I have consulted her for my baby from the time she was born. My baby is now over a year.
** *** **** *** ************* ********* ********** She is very cautious on what should be given to the baby. She observes gets tests done and then suggests. 
2. I don't have to take the baby to the hospital all the time for followup for an issue. She is accessible over mail. Fast response. She responds to mails even on Sundays and late hours. 
3. She investigates throughly and is also patient and friendly. 
4. She does not put us in "panic" mode. making us anxious parents run around in circles. 

Overall good Doctor.

tags: None
review: The Cloud9 hospital Old airport road, Bangalore is more interested in money than providing care. I went for a consultation as my daughter was suffering from Cough on 21-Nov-2016. The doctor asked to try cough syrup for few days and she suggested to start antibiotics if she is not getting better in 7 days. There was no improvement event after 1 week and when I went for followup. I was asked to pay the full consultation fee again. The followup consultation is free for most hospitals I'm aware of . But Cloud9 did not agree for this and the doctor also refused to do the followup unless the payment is made. This is just a good way of looting people. Asking for double consultation for same illness.

tags: None
review: Doctor didn't have time to hear us. She didn't care. Not about what other doctor has mentioned in previous advice. She just prescribed what she thought in less than 1 min. No advice on what foods to continue.. when we asked while she was about to jump out to other room (where other patient would be waiting).. continue with whatever you are doing as if she knew what we are feeding. In total she has no time to examine child fully, previous records or anything.. Cloudnine Hospital charges a lot as consultancy, such attitude by Doctor is not expected.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Good doctor she is treating well. No problem with the doctor and treatment. 
The problem is waiting to see the doctor. Means I have an appointment at 2.15pm .but I have to wait another 50 minutes . 
No proper parking space in the hospital ( paid parking ) and mainly rood behaviour in the reception.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is very nice, soft spoken. She addresses to all our queries and always try to interact with the kid so well , so that everyone (child and parents) both feel so comfortable to share the health concerns. She tells in detail about the treatment why it is required and what best can be done. Did not feel that gives unnecessary medicines and tests. Feel very genuine and nice treatment from the doctor. I should thank Dr.Sriprada mam for recommending Dr. Meena mam. Thanks a lot to both of them

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Meena is excellent, she has always given the appropriate advise on my son's health improvements, very polite and friendly and is always ready to explain in case of any doubts or queries...a** ********** *** ***** *************I will be more happy to recommend her for any parent looking for a **** pediatrician:)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Till now we are satisfied with the treatment and vaccination. I like how Dr Meena explains everything in detail. We are following her advice on each and everything. We get appointment easily for her. Last but not least I would say she is a very good doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Meena explains well and she encourages questions. She would not prescribe medicine unless it is absolutely necessary. In our first visit, she shared her email address and asked us to connect in case of emergency. Very few doctors do that in Bangalore (at least in our experience so far). Seems like she has infinite patience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: We have been visiting doctor Meena since my daughters birth. She explains very clearly about the health issues and answers all our queries. In fact my daughter likes her a lot as she treats children very friendly and also for all the health issues we had been to her my daughter has recovered from it. Thanks to Meena Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Meenas greatest asset is her warm smile and kind demeanor - brings the human element into childcare which is all too rare these days.

She is also extremely responsive and is never more than 30 minutes away from a crisp and clear email response to any query that parents may have regarding their child's health. I might also add that she is fairly confident in her advice which plays such an important role in the success of any treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She listens patiently. Understands the problem, asks the right questions and advises the best course of remedy/action. We have been visiting her for our son since his 1st year and now he is 4 years old. We are very convinced and wouldn't look elsewhere for a pediatrician for our son. She is also very responsive on emails over weekends as well.

tags: None
review: She is extremely calm and cordial and listens to every child problem with patience.Her prescribed medicines has always helped my daughter and she is always there to help parents via mail and calls whenever required.She also answers back promptly to the queries asked through mail.

tags: None
review:
"Smiling Doctor" 
She was very polite & cordial . She listened to the problems patiently. Post that she explained us the treatment in detail. 

She spends lot of time with the patient which gives lot of confidence to both the patient & the parents. 

Highly recommended

tags: None
review: *** ** *** **** ****** *** ***** from 2month old baby i m consulting her. she is very good in answering all our questions, even very silly questions.also she is always reachable on email too. within one hour she will reply to email incase if we have any questions. always smile and face and treats baby and parents well. i would strongly recommend for any age group kids.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am very much satisfied with Dr.Meena Venkatraman. Although my 2nd baby was born in jaynagar Cloudnine hospital,we couldn't travel so far for check up. When my first child was admitted for heavy cold and cough in Old airport road Cloudnine hospital, Dr.Meena was consulting my kid I was very much satisfied with the treatment that's why I suggested Dr.Meena Venkatraman

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.Meena is THE doctor for my child. She has been treating her since she was a month old. Dr. Meena always does prompt diagnosis and appropriate treatment. She is a gold medalist from US and it shows in her approach towards her patient. She always responds to mail queries if needed. She is very humble and answers all the queries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Our experience with Dr Meena was really awesome. My 4.5 year old son was hospitalized. She explained us  each and every thing very clearly, which reduces our tension to high extend.She was so prompt in replying to the mails.She told us at the time of discharge if we have any confusion we can even talk to her over phone ,which in Bangalore generally doctor never says.She was in touch with us over email until my son was perfectly fine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is very nice and very friendly doctor. I was showing my daughter mahati since 2 years. She does not give unnecessary medications. Intially we were worried of why madam not giving any cough syrup or any antibiotic for my daughter even though she is coughing so much.. But yes with her medication kids will get immunity. Thank you cloudnine for having such good doctors. She accomodates walkins in hectic schedule thank you madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would describe Dr Meena V as a very "mother friendly" doctor. Evevry mother is always very anxious about her child and has hundreds of questions about the child's well-being. Dr Meena, very patiently listens to every query a mother has and explains till the point she feels that the mother's anxiety has been answered.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: my 9month baby was suffering from fungal nappy rash for last 2weeks. was using rash cream prescribed by other doc. After explaining to her, she gave one more cream to be mixed with previously prescribed rash cream. ** ***** ****** *** **** **** ***** ** ***** **. this is not the first time I bisited Dr. Meena. I will always prescribe her. Thanks Dr. Meena.

tags: None
review: Fess for cloudnine is little on the higher side; it is 600 Rs . They charged 50Rs for valet parking which is just not acceptable. They gave a coupon to have coffee in their cafeteria which is not required better they do something with the huge fees they are charging

tags: None
review: We have been seeing Dr. Meena Since the time when Our Baby Girl was 19 Days Old and Dr Meena is extremely approachable and even available for us thru emails while we were on travel and respond timely to our queries . Very gifted Doctor who has a Acumen for Kids and Dr Meena 's advise had been very very helpful for our Baby and to us. Always smiling and positive and She is very patient enough to clear all our queries and  give helpful tips for baby care .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Meena has taken care of my son for the past 10 years now. While he is a teenager now we will never forget how a consultation with Dr Meena helped us feel at ease. 
She is always smiling and explains everything patiently. And one thing that makes you actually feel taken care of is her phrase at the end of every consultation to the child ‘ Feel Better’ . 
That means a lot . 
She was quick to diagnose appendicitis and refer to the specialist in time and she ensured My son was at ease during that time . 
Lot of instances where she was with us and we felt a deep sense of comfort . 
Thanks to her pleasant demeanour and being an excellent doctor !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Meena is perfect in every way. I have no issues with her. *** ** *** **** ************ *** ** ***** *** ***** * **** *********. My daughter trust and adores Dr Meena Venket.

My issue is with Cloud nine itself. The wait time is intolerable. My appointment was at 12.30 pm . I arrived at the hospital at 11.15am and yet by the time l got to pay and see the doctor it was 1.30 pm. 

I noticed that all persons whether you have an appointment or not have to wait with the same number line to make payment. 

This should not be the case. My suggestion is people with appointments should be allowed to just pay and go on with their appointment. The line to pay should only be for those with no appointment.

I hope this issue and mess is solved by the time l go to the hospital next. 

Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Meena Venkatraman is a great great pediatrician. She is an extremely warm and concerned doctor... Each time she has been consistently giving our child focussed attention, she listens to us and never rushes...she is available on mails and doesn't hesitate to reply for n number of times when required. She understands our worry as a parent and guides us on what's best for our child. Besides being a professional experienced doctor, Dr Meena stands out because she displays a great humanitarian attitude which is a rare quality. In other words going to her is total peace of mind.  Thanks Dr Meena.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: A dear friend recommended Dr. Meena Venkatraman and I thank her everyday for that. In doing so she connected me to a wonderful doctor who is abound in genuineness and excellence,  which a rare attribute. You are always greeted with a heart warning and pleasant smile while she answers all your (first time mom ) queries with patience . I was so relieved post my first meeting with Dr. Meena *** * ** ***** ** *** ********* **** ** ***** *** * ******** ************ * I recommend Dr. Meena positively and with the greatest faith.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My 11 month old son had fever on Saturday and took him to Claudine on Sunday evening. Since, no OPD available on Sunday, I showed him to Duty Doctor. Fever was 104+ and doctor was unable find the symptom and he said it is Viral fever. I was really upset and fever didn't comedown, waited 2 more days and i booked an appointment with Dr. Meena Venkataraman. She is very approachable and identified the issue within 2 mins. She said there is a ear infection and chest congestion. She asked me to discontinue medicine prescribed by the duty doctor and suggested new medicine. It worked well *** ** *** ********* ****** * **** I'm very happy about the treatment advised by Dr. Meena Venkataraman. Thank you.

tags: None
review: Was not satisfied as doctor recommended dengue test blindly. But in test report nothing was there. With their experience doctors should do some judgement before recommending test specially for kids. One should know how difficult is it for kids to do blood test.

tags: None
review:
Good. 
We have been consulting with her for both my kids now. (nearly 6 years) And have been happy almost all the time. 
She responds to queries directly and is also helpful as she understands the language we speak and the trials that people at home face.

tags: None
context: Neonatal Nursing,New Born Care,Children's Health,Health Checkup (Pediatric),
review:
*** ** *** **** *********** ** *** ******Her smile cures half of the problem any kid or any worries parents have.
Replies immediately to queries over email also. Right consulting and overall great experience makes her a trustworthy doctor. Have recommended and would always recommend others to Dr. Meena

tags: None
review:
Doctor was always cheerful, carefully listens each concern of us and address it immediately.
My children loves to visit Dr.Meena for consultation.
Her medical advice was always the best for us.
Appreciate her service!
We feel happy and peaceful that  our children's health concerns are from the right hands.
Thanks Dr.Meena,
Immanuel,Rachel 's parents.

tags: None
review:
She is a very good doctor. we are consulting her  for our daughter from her birth.
She is friendly, polite , understand well.
Her diagnosis is very apt and good.Please do take your little ones to her, she will make sure that  your child gets right medicine.

tags: None
review: I met her for the first time and had an annoying experience .She is fine. But one thing which really bothered me and I was very annoyed is that she was meeting two patients at one time. I had visited her for my 6month old baby's vaccination and consultation. She only gave total of 6 to 7 mins together for vaccination and consultation. I didn't like the way Cloudnine handles patients . The service seemed to be like any govt hospital.

tags: None
review: She is our first pediatric consultant since my daughters birth and we are really impressed by the way she addresses patients. Ever smiling face and an approachable attitude makes us feel at ease. Her recommendations have worked 100% in all cases. I would truly recommend her (I do) to my acquaintances. In spite of chaotic traffic and long distance I still prefer going to her over most of the doctors nearby.

tags: None
review: Appointment Staff can be bit more courteous. Polio drops were applied in the hall way. They could have rather taken the baby to a nursing room. Rest room signs are not fully clear - name the rooms in words - MALE / FEMALE. There is lot of noise with babies crying. Have some toys and play some soft music.

tags: None
review: Meena is an excellent Doctor who correctly finds out what the patient need and treat accordingly. We are completely satisfied from her treatment.  She treats in a way to prevent illness and responds to our queries very politely. I would like to recommend Meena to anyone who wants their bay to be treated by safe hands.

tags: None
review: we have been vising Cloud nine since last 2 and 1/2 year. and every time we have been experiencing that waiting time is more for prior appointment patients also. We had to wait min 1-2 hrs to make it to the doctor even if we take prior appointment. i don't know whats a meaning of appointment in Cloud nine hospital. the entire system of in Cloud nine for prior  appointment patients is not so good.

review:

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Took my 2.5 yr daughter to this hospital for cold and cough.

 The doctor was kind and prescribed asthalin , Budecort (with Huffpuff kit) metaspray and singular tabs. This never helped and the doctor kept recommending same for months and years.

Now I understand all paediatricians in cloud nine give this Huffpuff kit.

I have moved to Ayurveda treatment *** ***** ** ** *** ****** ******** No more steroids and dangerous chemicals. Ayurveda is safe and a long term solution.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor was very nice. The hospital experience was awful. Paying the fee alone took half an hour which added to the discomfort of being with a sick child in hospital. I suspected that my child’s rash could be contagious, which I brought to their attention and was eventually confirmed by the doctor, but they made us wait for an hour (half an hour of which was just to pay) surrounded by a bunch of newborns.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am consulting Dr. Meena for my kid for last 2 Years. Always in a smiling face, she used to listen to all your queries and answers them all. Never found her to prescribe lots of unnecessary medicines. I am very happy with the way she treats her patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She has magic in her hands we are seeing her from last 3 years. She is Very much approachable responds to every email we have sent her which made our life easy and worryless. tags: None
review: She always welcomes us with a smile. Very patient. Answers all the questions, even the dumbest ones, very nicely. She has been the only pediatrician I have relied on till date for my son, no one else were so trust worthy. I can trust her blindly. She even answers all our mails as soon as possible, even when she is on vacation. She is not money minded too, and recommends tests and medicines only if required.
